jp_text: そう　ありがとう

en_text: I filed a report with the\NMaritime Safety Support Department too,
jp_text: 海上安全装備局にも報告を上げたけど
google_translated: I also raised the report to the Marine Safety Equipment Bureau

en_text: Some think all of the crew should be taken\Ninto custody before they return to school.
jp_text: 学校に戻る前に全員拘束するべきではないかという意見もあるの
google_translated: There is also an opinion that all should not be restrained before returning to school

en_text: If anything else happens to the Harekaze,\Nyour position will be in jeopardy too, mother.
jp_text: お母さんの立場も危うくなるわ

en_text: You don't have to worry about me.
jp_text: 私の心配はしなくていいわ
google_translated: I do not have to worry about me

en_text: But something strange is definitely happening.
jp_text: でも　何か異常事態が発生している
google_translated: But some abnormal situation has occurred

en_text: Steady! Steady!
jp_text: ヨーソロー　ヨーソロー

en_text: Then what is it?
jp_text: じゃあなんですかね

en_text: I'll investigate.
jp_text: ここで扱っておいてもらいますかね

en_text: She said the Akashi\Nhad ten cm cannons in stock.
jp_text: 明石に長10センチ砲のストックがあったんだって
google_translated: Akashi had a long 10 cm gun stock

en_text: Yes! This increases our firing rate and improves\Nour firing speed and initial velocity!
jp_text: 発射速度も初速も向上しています
google_translated: The firing speed is also improving the initial speed

en_text: Captain of the Harekaze.
jp_text: 晴風艦長

en_text: After this,\Nwe're taking supplies to the Musashi.
jp_text: それじゃあ我々はこれで　これから武蔵の補給に向かう
google_translated: Well then, this will go to the replenishment of Musashi from now on

en_text: The Musashi?
jp_text: 武蔵？

en_text: The Musashi's beacon was cut off\Nand we don't know their location,
jp_text: 武蔵もビーコン切ってて　位置が分からないんで
google_translated: Musashi is also beacon and I do not know the position

en_text: Episode 4: Maidens in a Pinch!
jp_text: 調査を兼ねてなんだけど
